blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Honestly, I thought Dan looked a little too, not gonna lie. The only person I told was my friend, I wasn't about to go comment...
question: Honestly, I thought Dan looked a little too, not gonna lie. The only person I told was my friend, I wasn't about to go comment on his Insta "wHoA yOu LoOk ThInNeR". That's pretty rude. I just wish people had kept it to themselves.
answer: Exactly. It would be a little different if he looked unhealthy. If he posted some Eugenia cooney lookin ass picture, then yeah of course that would be extremely worrying, and it would be valid to voice concern over that. But he looks like he’s been exercising, that’s about it.

reblog.comment: Exactly. It would be a little different if he looked unhealthy. If he posted some Eugenia cooney lookin ass picture, then yeah of course that would be extremely worrying, and it would be valid to voice concern over that. But he looks like he’s been exercising, that’s about it.

trail.content_raw: Exactly. It would be a little different if he looked unhealthy. If he posted some Eugenia cooney lookin ass picture, then yeah of course that would be extremely worrying, and it would be valid to voice concern over that. But he looks like he’s been exercising, that’s about it.
trail.content: Exactly. It would be a little different if he looked unhealthy. If he posted some Eugenia cooney lookin ass picture, then yeah of course that would be extremely worrying, and it would be valid to voice concern over that. But he looks like he’s been exercising, that’s about it.

title: scared to fall
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2U6bjeX

by writingwannabe

It’s Dan Howell’s last year of high school, but he’s on the edge. As a way to make bullying stop, he tried to erase all his individuality, repressing who he really is in favour of blending in. Naturally, that hasn’t been good for him, but he doesn’t know how to stop.

In comes Phil Lester, a uni student running some creative writing classes at Dan’s school for extra credit. An unlikely friendship blossoms, and he helps Dan to see the world in a very different light.

Words: 770, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Dan Howell, Original Characters, Phil Lester
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: High School, Alternate Universe, Coming Out, Coming of Age, University Student Phil Lester, High School Student Dan Howell, Bullying, hoplessness, Slow Burn, Getting to Know Each Other, Implied/Referenced Homophobia


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2U6bjeX

reblog.comment:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2U6bjeX

blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

title: scared to fall
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2U6bjeX

by writingwannabe

It’s Dan Howell’s last year of high school, but he’s on the edge. As a way to make bullying stop, he tried to erase all his individuality, repressing who he really is in favour of blending in. Naturally, that hasn’t been good for him, but he doesn’t know how to stop.

In comes Phil Lester, a uni student running some creative writing classes at Dan’s school for extra credit. An unlikely friendship blossoms, and he helps Dan to see the world in a very different light.

Words: 770, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English
